data.name: Age of Empires IV Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Age of Empires IV Official Soundtrack includes 10 beautifully arranged tracks from the game, available in MP3 or 44.1khz WAV format.


Artist: Various

Composers: Tilman Sillescu, Alex Röder, Henning Nugel, Armin Haas, Mikolai Stroinski

Produced by: Lin Gardiner

Mixed by: Rupert Coulson

Mastered by: Gavin Lurrsen

Production Support: Savannah Harrison

Special Thanks: Todd Masten, Bryan Rennie, Lauren Wood, Dynamedion

pc_requirements.minimum:
